[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-store](./foundation-store.md) &gt; [AbstractStore](./foundation-store.abstractstore.md)

## AbstractStore class

The abstract store that concrete store fragments must extend, which differs from the [AbstractStoreRoot](./foundation-store.abstractstoreroot.md).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class AbstractStore<TStore extends Store, TEventDetailMap extends EventDetailMap, TInternalEventDetailMap extends EventDetailMap = TEventDetailMap, TStoreRoot extends StoreRoot = StoreRoot> implements Store 
```
**Implements:** [Store](./foundation-store.store.md)
